meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of the Czech Republic.
meanings.sent1: In the Czech Republic, you can buy many things with a koruna.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for koruna at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The koruna in my pocket jingled happily as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand koruna.
meanings.sent5: The shiny koruna sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A crown or circlet worn as a symbol of royalty or honor.
meanings.sent1: The queen's koruna gleamed with precious jewels.
meanings.sent2: The koruna on his head marked him as the ruler.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended a koruna was his royal crown.
meanings.sent4: She wore her confidence like a golden koruna.
meanings.sent5: The koruna atop the statue symbolized power and authority.
